sentences.en: A sentence that does not cohere is hard to understand.
sentences.cn: 前后不连贯的句子很难懂.

sentences.en: A substance or an agent that causes two or more objects or parts to cohere.
sentences.cn: 黏合剂:使两个或多个对象或部分连结起来的物品或媒介.

sentences.en: All the details are there and are correct but they don’t cohere.
sentences.cn: 所有的细节都摆在那里，而且都正确，但是它们并不一致。

sentences.en: Find all cohere method code integrity, and can be used directly.
sentences.cn: 找到所有凝聚法源代码的完整性, 并可以直接使用.

sentences.en: Homologous parts, as has been remarked by some authors, tend to cohere.
sentences.cn: 某些作者曾经说过,同源部分有互相合生的倾向.

sentences.en: Solids have a greater tendency cohere than liquids.
sentences.cn: 固体有更大的趋势,附着于液体.

sentences.en: The adornments do not cohere with the basic design.
sentences.cn: 装饰物与设计的基调不协调.

sentences.en: The necessity that he shall conform, that he shall cohere, is not one - sided.
sentences.cn: 他必须适应, 必须首尾一贯, 但这种“必须”并不是片面的.

sentences.en: The particles making up a brick cohere.
sentences.cn: 构成砖的分子凝聚为一.

sentences.en: The various elements of the novel fail to cohere.
sentences.cn: 这部小说的各部分之间缺乏连贯性。

sentences.en: This view does not cohere with their other beliefs.
sentences.cn: 这个观点与他们的其他看法不一致。

sentences.en: To cause to cohere or form a mass.
sentences.cn: 无内聚性的由不能粘着的质点组成.

sentences.en: To cohere or form a mass.
sentences.cn: 凝聚成一团或形成一堆.

sentences.en: To cohere with or as if with a bond.
sentences.cn: 用绳子或象用绳子一样连结起来.

sentences.en: When you squeeze a handful of snow, the flakes cohere to make a snowball.
sentences.cn: 你把一团雪捏紧, 雪就黏合成雪球.

words.tran_cn: 连贯的，一致的；明了的；清晰的；凝聚性的；互相偶合的；粘在一起的
有结合力的；紧密结合的；有粘着力的
连贯地；前后一致地；条理清楚地；互相偶合地；凝聚性地
凝聚；结合；[力] 内聚力

trans.tran_cn: 黏合，联合，结合，（指看法、推理等）前后一致
trans.tran_en: if ideas, arguments, beliefs, statements etc cohere, they are connected in a clear and reasonable way
